alert.note: Alert for Independence; Jackson; Lawrence (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 7:30PM CST until January 07 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Arkansas... Black River At Black Rock affecting Independence, Lawrence and Jackson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River At Black Rock. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying cultivated land and pastures in Lawrence, Jackson, and Independence counties flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 6.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 18.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 6 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Crest Time Date Black River Black Rock 14.0 6.3 Mon 7 PM 18.5 15.6 14.0 18.5 12 PM 1/03 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
